Comment: **TL;DR**: A federal judge accused the Trump administration of acting in "bad faith" by ignoring court orders and obstructing efforts to return a wrongly deported man from El Salvador. Despite Supreme Court orders, officials cited vague privileges and shifted blame. Judges have repeatedly rebuked the administration over deportation practices.
